cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. If you cancel, your service will remain active until the end of your billing period.

domain.question: How does the custom domain feature work?
domain.answer: With paid plans, you can connect your existing domain or purchase a new one directly through our platform. We'll handle all the technical setup for you.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
upgrade.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade your plan at any time. The new pricing will be prorated for the remainder of your billing period.
